title: What are some good songs for someone who wants to feel angry? - Quora

It's a very odd question.People usually want to hear songs,to take their anger away.Why on earth would someone try to get angry?I suspect that you got hurt,or maybe you're disappointed?If any of these contribute to the case,you should rather listen to songs,to help you release the pain and/or anger.After my 2nd husband committed suicide,I was extremely angry at him,for “leaving” me,with our daughter,the pride and joy of his life,of only 2 and a half years old(The other 3 were from my previous marriage,which he adored by the way and in turn they just LOVED him)I “hated”him for what he did to me.There was no explanation,no letter,no reason…I turned to music I heard before,but didn't really LISTEN to.I HATED the songs we enjoyed together.Especialy the songs that played on the night of his death..it was the 10th of April,on his birthday.Then after a few months,I felt the pain and heart-ache.I played “our”songs repeatedly.Don Williams is still a big favorite today.Even my children know most of his songs…Amanda,Lay down beside me,I recall a Gypsy woman.Also Roxette.. you've got the look and Dressed for success,were some of the songs,he liked to sing along with and to me,when we got ready to paint the town red.Chris Izaak,Wicked games and OMD,Sailing the seven seas,Dire Straits with Money for nothing.We loved Groovy kind of love,by Phil Collins.I couldn't stop playing Sinead O'Connor’s;Nothing compare to you and Frank Duval’s;If I could fly,OMD’s;everybody hurt sometimes…over and over again.While I listened to the songs,I cried like there was no tomorrow.Then I got angry!How dare he!He had a good pension fund,that paid out quite a big sum of money,but still,this is his little girl,that loves her daddy SO much,that doesn't understand and the money couldn't buy him back.I knew quite a few artists and songs,as I grew up with it,while my sister and then my brother,was still living at home.I started listening more to Pink Floyd,Bon Jovi,Iron Maiden,ACDC,Van Halen,Black Sabbath,Guns’n Roses…When looking back now,it just seems,that he chose his birthday for a reason.. we got married on the 17th June,it was my birthday,my youngest daughter was born 2 and a half years later and he died 2 and a half years later.. Coincidence?All this aside.Hopefully you can understand,why I find it somewhat awkward,that someone would want to USE music,to BECOME angry.I personally think,that music can sometimes be a big give away,of the mood you're in.The different genres,bring different feelings out,in a different people.I turned to heavy metal and hard rock,to express my anger.This type of music,is more or less the music,someone tend to listen to,when in a daring,non-caring,hurting or ruthless mood.Others could use this same music,as a good and loving memory.Please don't use music to start anger,where there wasn't any.Rather use music,as part of the way you process your feelings.May it be happy,sad,anger,in love,disappointment….Hope you find my answer useful in some way.Best of luck with whatever you're going through.Keep us updated.
